alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Indian Wells Valley; Kern River Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes; Piute Walker Basin; South End of the Lower Sierra; South End of the Upper Sierra; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 01 at 9:50AM PDT until April 04 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...South End of the Lower Sierra, South End of the Upper Sierra, Kern River Valley, Piute Walker Basin, Tehachapi, Grapevine, Frazier Mountain Communities, Indian Wells Valley, Mojave Desert Slopes and Mojave Desert. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas with wet soil due to recent heavy rain could see an extensive amounts of trees blown over.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Indian Wells Valley; Kern River Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes; Piute Walker Basin; South End of the Lower Sierra; South End of the Upper Sierra; Tehachapi
